meta.name: description
meta.content: Alcoa City Schools is a highly rated, public school district located in Alcoa, TN. It has 1,969 students in grades PK, K-12 with a student-teacher ratio of 17 to 1.

header.h2: Schools are closed for the remainder of the 19-20 school year.

div.p: Schools now closed for the rest of the 19-20 school year. Learning opportunities and school meal distribution continues. Click announcement for FAQs.

h3.a: Schools are closed for the remainder of the 19-20 school year.

div.div: Schools now closed for the rest of the 19-20 school year. Learning opportunities and school meal distribution continues. Click announcement for FAQs.

h3.a: Continuing: Students Meals While Schools are Closed

div.div: Free student meals are being distributed Mondays and Wednesdays from 10 am -12 noon from Alcoa High School. All neighborhood deliveries have been stopped.

h3.a: COVID-19 Information from Coordinated School Health

div.div: Find access to tips and activities that promote student mental and physical health during the COVID-19 outbreak.
